title: CELL_CAM_ACTIVATE_SELFIE_MODE
content:
0x015C49A93E3E086E0x4479B304// CellCamActivateSelfieMode
void CELL_CAM_ACTIVATE_SELFIE_MODE(BOOL toggle);Parameters:toggle: True to activate and false to deactivate the selfie mode.Toggles the selfie mode on the cellphone camera. Only visible when the cell phone camera is active.Old name:  _DISABLE_PHONE_THIS_FRAMEOld name:  _CELL_CAM_DISABLE_THIS_FRAME
